projects.title: Spotify Notifications
projects.description: A little helper that glues together Spotify and OS X Notification Center. It provides users with native notifications when a new song plays or the current song resumes. Also provided is a global keyboard shortcut, Last.fm integration, etc.

projects.title: RHoK The Hood
projects.description: A collaboration between myself and @nolski, it's an attempt to provide the residents of Rochester City with an easy way to visualize information that we found was frequently requested through the Freedom of Information Law in a concise manner at a block level using the power of Geographic Information Systems.

projects.title: ReactIRC
projects.description: A flask-inspired library for developing IRC bots. It comes with an embedded web server for receiving POST requests from webhook enabled services.

projects.title: PowerShell.docset
projects.description: A docset documenting PowerShell cmdlets. The docset is built by scraping the PowerShell documentation for cmdlets, downloading relevant documentation, cleaning the HTML, and then bundling the docset. More information here.

projects.title: VauxIo
projects.description: A collaboration between myself and @rossdylan, VauxIo is a peer to peer network for sharing documentation and keeping information and data free and available.

projects.title: Ludicrous MV
projects.description: A little experiment in 'compressing' files by their checksum. 'Compressing' files is quick and the 'compressed' versions are tiny, but 'decompressing' files could take forever.

projects.title: Flask Analytics
projects.description: A Flask plugin for generating analytics code. Supports Google Analytics, Piwik, Gaug.es, Chartbeat, and GoSquared.
